languages.text: "Госпожа Клеменциа не допустит, чтобы ваша воля осталась неуслышанной или невоспринятой близко к сердцу".
"Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Клеменциа не допустит, чтобы ваша воля осталась неуслышанной или невоспринятой близко к сердцу".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Clementia will not allow our will to be unheard or not taken close to heart."
"Lady Clementia will not allow our will to be unheard or not taken close to heart."
"Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."
"Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations will find their way into every ear and zealously embraced."

"Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."
"Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."

languages.text: “克莱门缇雅女士会忠诚地传达您的命令，确保您的要求落在实处。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."

traits.locale_text: “克莱门缇雅女士会忠诚地传达您的命令，确保您的要求落在实处。”
“克莱门缇雅女士会忠诚地传达您的命令，确保您的要求落在实处。”

languages.text: «Lady Clementia se asegurará de que sus declaraciones lleguen a todos los oídos y se acojan con celo».
languages.original_text: "Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Clementia se asegurará de que sus declaraciones lleguen a todos los oídos y se acojan con celo».

languages.text: 「レディ・クレメンティアが、陛下の宣言があらゆる人の耳に届き、熱心に受け入れられるようにするだろう」
languages.original_text: "Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・クレメンティアが、あなたの宣言があらゆる人の耳に届き、熱心に受け入れられるようにするだろう」
「レディ・クレメンティアが、あなたの宣言があらゆる人の耳に届き、熱心に受け入れられるようにするだろう」

languages.text: « Dame Clémentia s'assurera que vos déclarations soient entendues et bien comprises par tous. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Clémentia s'assurera que vos déclarations soient entendues et bien comprises par tous. »

languages.text: "Lady Clementia wird sicherstellen, dass Eure Erklärungen ihren Weg in jedes Ohr finden und eifrig angenommen werden."
languages.original_text: "Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Clementia wird sicherstellen, dass Eure Erklärungen ihren Weg in jedes Ohr finden und eifrig angenommen werden."
"Lady Clementia wird sicherstellen, dass Eure Erklärungen ihren Weg in jedes Ohr finden und mit Feuereifer angenommen werden."

languages.text: "Leydi Clementia, yönergelerinizi duymayan kalmadığından ve herkesin şevkle benimsediğinden emin olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Lady Clementia will ensure that your declarations find their way into every ear and are zealously embraced."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Clementia, yönergelerinizi duymayan kalmadığından ve herkesin şevkle benimsediğinden emin olacaktır."
